personal_info.name: Mahad Usman
personal_info.title: A passionate Fullstack developer and AI Engineer
personal_info.about: I am Mahad Usman, a dedicated Fullstack developer and AI Engineer with a strong passion for creating innovative solutions. With expertise in both frontend and backend technologies, I strive to build seamless and efficient applications that meet user needs. My journey in the tech world has equipped me with a diverse skill set, allowing me to tackle complex challenges and deliver high-quality results. I am committed to continuous learning and staying updated with the latest industry trends to ensure my work remains cutting-edge.

giaic.name: Governor Initiative for Artificial Intelligence and Computing
giaic.role: Agentic AI and other AI stuff

experience.desc: Serving as the Chief Operating Officer and Development Lead at Gracode Studio, overseeing operations and leading the development team to deliver high-quality software solutions.
Worked as a Frontend Developer Intern at Digitorm,where I collaborated with a team of developers to implement responsive designs and enhance user experience.
Worked as a React Developer Intern at Devsum, where I contributed to building dynamic web applications using React.js and improved application performance.

projects.name: Tech Ecommerce Website
projects.desc: Developed a comprehensive ecommerce website specializing in tech products, featuring user authentication, product listings, shopping cart functionality, and secure checkout process.

projects.name: School Chatbot
projects.desc: Created an AI-powered chatbot for school-related queries, utilizing GEMINI API to provide accurate and helpful responses to students and staff.

projects.name: File Manager Agent
projects.desc: Developed a File Manager Agent using OpenAI Agents SDK and GEMINI API, deployed on Railway, to assist users in managing and organizing their files efficiently.

projects.name: Youtube Agent
projects.desc: Created a Youtube Agent using OpenAI Agents SDK and GEMINI API, deployed on Railway, to help users search and manage Youtube content effectively.

projects.name: Hundreds Days of Code
projects.desc: An ongoing personal challenge where I code daily for 100 days, focusing on improving my TypeScript skills and building various projects to enhance my coding proficiency.
